a.n: IN THE LAND OF ENFLOWERED MEN

p.k: In Southern Saudi Arabia, at the heart of the mountain range of Tihama, which separates the Red Sea from the Rűb Al khalî desert, live the Enflowered-men. They are great warriors, who put on make up and adorn themselves with flowers to show their strength. Divided into wide clans, they breed goats, their only wealth, in a sun-burnt landscape of dust and pebbles. A story of pride and honor and family secrets.
